definitions.definition: A chemical element ( symbol S) with an atomic number of 16, having a bright yellow color and characteristic smell, used commercially in a variety of products such as insecticides , black powder , and matchsticks .
A yellowish green colour, like that of sulfur.
Any of various pierid butterflies of the subfamily Coliadinae , especially the sulfur-coloured species.

main_definition: ( uncountable ) A chemical element ( symbol S) with an atomic number of 16, having a bright yellow color and characteristic smell, used commercially in a variety of products such as insecticides , black powder , and matchsticks .
secondary_definitions: ( countable , uncountable ) A yellowish green colour, like that of sulfur.
Any of various pierid butterflies of the subfamily Coliadinae , especially the sulfur-coloured species.
